column2: "Ao kɛtseankyɛ eyɛ mo nuabanyin a Onuum me na n'enumfo ano! Sɛ muhu wo wɔ ehuw mu beebi a
column4: na nkyɛ obiara nnkobu me enyimtsia."

column2: "Nkyɛ medze wo bɛba me na fie
column3: Na akyerɛkyerɛ me adze; Nkyɛ mebɛma anom nsa a eduhuam wɔ mu
hom nka ntam nkyerɛ me Dɛ hom nnkopusuw hɛn dɔ

column2: "Woana nye nyia ofir sar do reba
column3: Ɔtwer no dɔfo no bo mu yi? Aperdua no ase na minyaan wo: Hɔ na wo na woo wo
column4: Hɔ na nyia ɔwoo wo no ɔkoo awo."

column2: "Fa me si w'akoma do dɛ nsɔwano
column3: dɛ w'abaw do nsɔwano: Na ɔdɔ yɛ dzen dɛ owu; Nyinkun ne tsirmu yɛ dzen dɛ adakamona: N'enyinam yɛ ogya enyinam
Nkyii so nsuyirii nntum nnkata do: Sɛ nyimpa dze fie adze nyinara bɛma wɔ ɔdɔ ntsi a
Na ɔmmbɔɔ enumfo: Ebɛnadze na yɛbɛyɛ ama hɛn akyerɛbaa Wɔ da a wɔbɛba ebebisa no ayewar no mu?"
Yɛbɔtow no do dwetɛ aban: Na sɛ ɔyɛ abow a
column4: Yɛdze nkyindur ntaabow botwa no ho ehyia."
na m'enumfo tse dɛ no do abantsentsen: Ɔno na meyɛɛ n'enyiwa do dɛ obi a oenya asomdwee."

column2: "Solomon nyaa wenyin ture wɔ Baal-hamon; Ɔdze wenyin ture no hyɛɛ ahwɛfo nsa; No mu nduadzewa no ntsi
column3: na ɔwɔ dɛ obiara obiara dze dwetɛbona apem brɛ no."

column2: "Mo wenyin ture a ɔyɛ medze no ɔwɔ m'enyim: Ɔwo
column5: Na hɔn a wɔhwɛ no nduadzewa no do no so wobenya ahaebien."

column3: M'anyɛnkofo ritsie wo ndze: Ma mo so mintsie ɛ."

column4: Keka woho dɛ ɔwansan anaa ɔtweba Wɔ nduhuam mbepɔw no do."
